title: Ticket #1937: If built w/o hadoop, HDFS still in default DAEMON_LIST
description:
No hadoop external (from src/condor_includes/config.h): 
///* Do we have the hadoop external*/
/* #undef HAVE_EXT_HADOOP */

Yet, the RPM has HDFS in it's default DAEMON_LIST: 

nleroy@talon:~/devel/condor/trunk/build> condor_config_val -v daemon_list
DAEMON_LIST: COLLECTOR, MASTER, NEGOTIATOR, SCHEDD, STARTD, HDFS
  Defined in '/etc/condor/condor_config.local', line 33.
creator: nleroy
